metadata.title: CVE-2022-47696 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered Binutils objdump before 2.39.3 allows attackers tocause a denial of service or other unspecified impacts via functioncompare_symbols.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-47696` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

binutils - 2.30-21ubuntu1~18.04.9
binutils-aarch64-linux-gnu - 2.30-21ubuntu1~18.04.9
binutils-alpha-linux-gnu - 2.30-21ubuntu1~18.04.9
binutils-arm-linux-gnueabi - 2.30-21ubuntu1~18.04.9

criterions.comment: binutils package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.30-21ubuntu1~18.04.9').
